name: Shattered Tears
description:
Shattered tears is a 2D survival horror game, with omnidirectional movement and a gothic horror setting. A very human and relatable feeling lurks in the confines of the old house, you will meet our nameless protagonist, an individual who is haunted by their troubled past, they have to escape the roots of despair that have been engrained in their mind. Help them get through dark times, as they face their worst fears and let go of that which haunts their dreams. They feel stuck in time, and so their world has grown stale and dim. Will you release them from this hell, or will they submit to their demons?

Controls:

WASD or 🡣🡡🡢🡠 = Move

ESC = Quit Game
